name: GreenMem® GM300X-2520
description: GreenMem® GM300X-2520 is a versatile filter aid with a high surface area, offering cost-effective solutions for various industrial processes. It ensures lower energy consumption and high separation speed while also minimizing CO2 emissions. This product facilitates wax removal, solvent recovery, API concentration and purification, free fatty acid removal, and more, including homogeneous catalyst recovery and lipid removal. Its effectiveness extends to hydrocarbon separation, monomer removal, and solvent exchange, making it an ideal choice for diverse applications in chemical manufacturing.
